Method Detail

update

public boolean update()
               throws IOException
If the override file is configured, either by a system property or programmatically, the properties are loaded from the file and exposed to the exchange clients. If not, but the remote update was configured, either by a system property or programmatically, remote configuration is downloaded, stored locally and used to load the configuration. If not, the internal configuration file, kept in xchange-core, is used. Exchange client implementation should never call this method directly. Note: downloading a file over the Internet may take significant amount of time.

Returns:
false if update was not configured
Throws:
IOException

getProperties

public Properties getProperties()
Returns the current configuration properties. May never return null.

Returns:
the current configuration properties. Never a null.
